name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BazQux Reader: open links in background tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the 'b' keyboard shortcut to open links in the background tab in BazQux Reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome no longer allows websites to open links in background tabs. Websites could only open links in a new tab with an immediate focus switch (and a popup blocker could block even that). So this extension is necessary for BazQux Reader to open the current article link in the background tab when you press the 'b' key.
